headline: Newcastle United sign Northern Ireland international Rachel Furness
summary: Newcastle United have signed midfielder Rachel Furness following the expiry of her contract at Bristol City. The 36-year-old has scored 38 goals in 95 caps for her country and helped both Bristol City and Liverpool […]

headline: Leicester City Women sign Belgian international Sari Kees
summary: Leicester City have added 23-year-old Belgian international defender Sari Kees from OH Leuven in a three-year-deal. She has represented her country 28 times and helped Leuven to three successive second-place finishes in the Belgian Women’s […]

headline: Nigeria international Toni Payne pens deal with Everton Women
summary: Everton have signed Nigeria international Toni Payne, who had spent the past six years with Spanish top-flight team Sevilla. The 29-year-old midfielder/forward helped her country to the last 16 of the 2023 World Cup, having […]

headline: Ireland and Wales could clash in UEFA Women’s EURO play-offs
summary: Republic of Ireland and Wales will meet in the UEFA Women’s EURO 2025 Round 2 qualification play-offs should they both win through their first ties. Wales first face Slovakia with their second leg at home, while […]
